test_strategy_covers_all_types.note: Adapted for markdown-only refactoring. Unit/integration/E2E/security N/A. Performance via V-001 line count. Regression via V-004. Content validation via V-002, V-003. Structural via V-005.

test_cases_for_all_requirements.note: 46 test cases covering all 12 FRs, 6 NFRs, 4 SMs, and 32 ACs.

traceability_matrix_complete.note: 100% requirement coverage verified. Every FR and NFR maps to at least 1 test case. Traceability matrix CSV with 68 rows.

coverage_targets_defined.note: Regression baseline: ESM 629/632, CJS 1607/1608. CLAUDE.md <= 268 lines. Net reduction >= 29 lines. Zero new failures.

test_data_strategy_documented.note: Section 7: pre-refactor baselines from design spec, grep patterns for verification, no external test data needed.

critical_paths_identified.note: Section 5.2: 8 risks identified with mitigation tests. Execution order in Section 5.3: V-004, V-002, V-003, V-001, V-005.

article_II.evidence: Test strategy designed in Phase 05 before implementation (Phase 06). 46 test cases cover all requirements.

article_VII.evidence: Traceability matrix maps every FR, NFR, AC, and SM to specific test cases. 100% coverage.

article_IX.evidence: GATE-05 checklist fully validated. All 6 gate items pass.

article_XI.evidence: No new component interactions. Existing integration tests (V-004) validate unchanged behavior. Content integration verified by V-003.
